member.name: T:AGI.Ui.Plugins.IAgUiPlugin
member.summary: Represents a UI plugin that extends the GUI of the hosting application at run-time.

member.summary: Initializes the UI plugin.

member.summary: Shuts down the UI plugin.

member.summary: Allows the UI plugin to configure a custom toolbar.

member.summary: Represents a site object for the custom windows hosted within the integrated enviroment.

member.name: M:AGI.Ui.Plugins.IAgUiPluginEmbeddedControlSite.SetModifiedFlag(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Call this method to indicate you have made modifications. This will force the framework to prompt to save changes before closing the window hosting the control.

member.name: P:AGI.Ui.Plugins.IAgUiPluginEmbeddedControlSite.Window
member.summary: Returns a pointer to the container that is hosting the embedded control.

member.name: P:AGI.Ui.Plugins.IAgUiPluginEmbeddedControlSite.Plugin
member.summary: Returns a pointer to the Ui plugin object that created the embedded control.

member.name: P:AGI.Ui.Plugins.IAgUiPluginEmbeddedControlSite.IsModified
member.summary: Indicates whether there have been any modifications made to the hosted control.

member.name: T:AGI.Ui.Plugins._IAgUiPluginEmbeddedControlSite
member.summary: Represents a site object for the custom windows hosted within the integrated enviroment.

member.name: M:AGI.Ui.Plugins._IAgUiPluginEmbeddedControlSite.SetModifiedFlag(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Call this method to indicate you have made modifications. This will force the framework to prompt to save changes before closing the window hosting the control.

member.name: P:AGI.Ui.Plugins._IAgUiPluginEmbeddedControlSite.Window
member.summary: Returns a pointer to the container that is hosting the embedded control.

member.name: P:AGI.Ui.Plugins._IAgUiPluginEmbeddedControlSite.Plugin
member.summary: Returns a pointer to the UI plugin object that created the embedded control.

member.name: P:AGI.Ui.Plugins._IAgUiPluginEmbeddedControlSite.IsModified
member.summary: Indicates whether there have been any modifications made to the hosted control.

member.name: T:AGI.Ui.Plugins.IAgUiPluginEmbeddedControl
member.summary: Represents a hosted control object embedded into a custom widow hosted within the integrated environment.

member.name: M:AGI.Ui.Plugins.IAgUiPluginEmbeddedControl.SetSite(AGI.Ui.Plugins.IAgUiPluginEmbeddedControlSite)
member.summary: Framework calls the method to initialize the embedded control by providing the pointer to the control's site object.

member.name: M:AGI.Ui.Plugins.IAgUiPluginEmbeddedControl.OnClosing
member.summary: Framework calls the method to notify the control when the parent window is being closed.

member.name: M:AGI.Ui.Plugins.IAgUiPluginEmbeddedControl.OnSaveModified
member.summary: Framework calls the method to notify the control it needs to save any pending modifications.

member.name: M:AGI.Ui.Plugins.IAgUiPluginEmbeddedControl.GetIcon
member.summary: Framework calls the method to retrieve an icon to be used as the window icon. The implementation can return a valid pointer to a IPictureDisp object or null if a default icon should be used.

member.name: T:AGI.Ui.Plugins.IAgUiPluginWindowSite
member.summary: The interface enables creating custom windows within the integrated environment.

member.name: M:AGI.Ui.Plugins.IAgUiPluginWindowSite.CreateToolWindow(AGI.Ui.Plugins.IAgUiPlugin,System.Object,System.String)
member.summary: Creates a custom tool window that hosts the control specified by the parameter pPlugin. The method returns a pointer to the newly created window.

member.summary: Creates a custom tool window using the given parameters.

member.name: M:AGI.Ui.Plugins.IAgUiPluginWindowSite.CreateNetToolWindow(AGI.Ui.Plugins.IAgUiPlugin,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Creates a custom tool window that hosts the .NET user control loaded from the assembly specified by the assemblyPath.

member.name: M:AGI.Ui.Plugins.IAgUiPluginWindowSite.CreateNetToolWindowParam(AGI.Ui.Plugins.IAgUiPlugin,AGI.Ui.Plugins.IAgUiPluginWindowCreateParameters)
member.summary: Creates a custom tool window that hosts the .NET user control loaded from the assembly specified by the assemblyPath.

member.name: M:AGI.Ui.Plugins.IAgUiPluginWindowSite.CreateParameters
member.summary: Returns a new instance of the parameters used to create custom tool windows.

member.name: T:AGI.Ui.Plugins.IAgUiPluginEmbeddedWindowHandle
member.summary: The interface is used to with native user controls which can be hosted by the integrated environment.

member.name: M:AGI.Ui.Plugins.IAgUiPluginEmbeddedWindowHandle.Apply
member.summary: Apply any changes made to the underlying data object. Returning an error if unsuccessful.

member.name: P:AGI.Ui.Plugins.IAgUiPluginEmbeddedWindowHandle.HWND
member.summary: Returns the HWND of the embedded control.

member.name: T:AGI.Ui.Plugins.IAgUiPlugin2
member.summary: UI plugin optionally implements IAgUiPlugin2 to extend the application's custom menus and main menu bar.

member.name: M:AGI.Ui.Plugins.IAgUiPlugin2.OnDisplayMenu(System.String,AGI.Ui.Plugins.AgEUiPluginMenuBarKind,AGI.Ui.Plugins.IAgUiPluginMenuBuilder2)
member.summary: OnDisplayMenu is invoked by the hosting application when a context menu or a top level menu is about to be displayed. Using the specified menu builder, UI Plugins can add custom menu items or sub-menus to the context menus or top level menus.

member.name: T:AGI.Ui.Plugins.AgEUiPluginMenuBarKind
member.summary: The enumeration values specify menu types that are extended at run-time by the UI Plugins.

member.name: F:AGI.Ui.Plugins.AgEUiPluginMenuBarKind.eUiPluginMenuBarTopLevelMenu
member.summary: A top level menu bar.

member.name: F:AGI.Ui.Plugins.AgEUiPluginMenuBarKind.eUiPluginMenuBarPopupMenu
member.summary: A pop-up menu that is displayed when users click on an menu bar button.

member.name: F:AGI.Ui.Plugins.AgEUiPluginMenuBarKind.eUiPluginMenuBarContextMenu
member.summary: A context menu.

member.name: T:AGI.Ui.Plugins.IAgUiPluginMenuBuilder2
member.summary: IAgUiPluginMenuBuilder2 extends the existing context menu extensibility mechanism. Using IAgUiPluginMenuBuilder2 the UI Plugin can now insert menu items and pop-up menus at a specified position of the parent menu.

member.name: M:AGI.Ui.Plugins.IAgUiPluginMenuBuilder2.InsertMenuItem(System.Int32,System.String,System.String,System.String,stdole.Picture)
member.summary: Insert a menu item at a specified position.

member.name: M:AGI.Ui.Plugins.IAgUiPluginMenuBuilder2.InsertSeparator(System.Int32)
member.summary: Inserts a menu item separator at a specified position.

member.name: M:AGI.Ui.Plugins.IAgUiPluginMenuBuilder2.InsertPopupMenu(System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: Creates and insert a new popup menu at a specified position.

member.name: M:AGI.Ui.Plugins.IAgUiPluginMenuBuilder2.GetPositionOf(System.String)
member.summary: Returns a position of the specified menu item or -1 if the specified menu item was not found.

member.name: M:AGI.Ui.Plugins.IAgUiPluginMenuBuilder2.AddMenuItem(System.String,System.String,System.String,stdole.Picture)
member.summary: Adds a menu item to an existing context menu.

member.name: M:AGI.Ui.Plugins.IAgUiPluginMenuBuilder2.AddSeparator
member.summary: Adds a menu item separator.

member.name: M:AGI.Ui.Plugins.IAgUiPluginMenuBuilder2.AddPopupMenu(System.String)
member.summary: Creates a new popup menu.

member.summary: A name of the currently loaded personality (possible values are 'STK', 'ODTK', etc.).

member.name: T:AGI.Ui.Plugins.AgUiPluginEmbeddedControlSite
member.summary: Represents a site object for the custom windows hosted within the integrated enviroment.

member.name: M:AGI.Ui.Plugins.AgUiPluginEmbeddedControlSite.SetModifiedFlag(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Call this method to indicate you have made modifications. This will force the framework to prompt to save changes before closing the window hosting the control.

member.summary: Returns a pointer to the container that is hosting the embedded control.

member.name: P:AGI.Ui.Plugins.AgUiPluginEmbeddedControlSite.Plugin
member.summary: Returns a pointer to the UI plugin object that created the embedded control.

member.summary: Indicates whether there have been any modifications made to the hosted control.

member.summary: Call this method to indicate you have made modifications. This will force the framework to prompt to save changes before closing the window hosting the control.

member.summary: Returns a pointer to the container that is hosting the embedded control.

member.summary: Returns a pointer to the UI plugin object that created the embedded control.

member.summary: Indicates whether there have been any modifications made to the hosted control.
